task.title: Sign In or Account Set Up for the Booking.com Application
task.shortdesc: To Sign In to the Booking.com Application:

context.p: Travellers can sign in to the Booking.com application with the Google web browser, with Facebook or with an email.

step.cmd: On the Sign In screen, select any options as Continue with Google, Continue With Facebook, or Continue with Email.

ul.li:
Continue with Google option selected.
The Choose an Account screen displays with a list of avialable accounts.
Choose any available gmail account or choose Add another account option.
Enter any other account.
The selected account is registered for Booking.com.

Continue With Facebook option selected.
The Facebook screen displays.
Enter the facebook account as Email Address and Password.
Click the To register button.
The facebook account is registerd for Booking.com application.

Continue with email option selected.
The Enter your email address screen displays.
Enter the email address in the Email address field.
Click Continue button.
The selected account is registered for Booking.com
